What our patients say about us

I have been wearing hearing aids since the age of 3 (genetic nerve damage) and when I moved to Las Vegas ten years ago, I continued to get my audiological services done when I'd go back home once or twice a year. I am SO glad I recently found Dr. Smith - she is FANTASTIC. She is extremely knowledgable about the software that runs my hearing aids and equally important, she understands the unique challenges that come with being a hearing aid user. The office staff is great too - everyone is friendly and wait times are essentially non-existent. If you need hearing services here in the valley, please give Dr. Smith a call!

Michelle L.
Spring Valley, Las Vegas, NV
